metadata.synopsis: A girl watches as her high-school idol (Juliette Lewis) meets a boy (C. Thomas Howell) and becomes an unwed mother in 1960s Long Island.

reviews: The movie starts out as half-baked comedy and congeals into hard-baked melodrama, with Aice delivering narration through it all like an insufferable tour guide.
Captivating film about that desperate childhood need we all had to have something special setting us apart from others.
